name: mikroe.click.stepdown6
short_description: Step Down 6 Click is a compact add-on board that converts higher voltages into lower ones. This board features the MPM54304, a quad-output power module from Monolithic Power Systems (MPS). It is a quad-output, DC/DC step-down power module with up to 3A per output on channels 1 and 2 and up to 2A per channels 3 and 4, providing continuous current on all four channels.
